name: SwitchItch
description:
Hop through a single level by turning on and off switches to navigate the screen.

This game was made for the 3 hour trijam. This project is unfished at the moment. I was overly ambitious on the idea and found that, I wanted to make this project bigger than it currently is now. Here is what I managed to make in about 4 hours, feedback is welcome but keep in mind this is not the finished product.

Controls: Click on the switches to turn on and off movement

Buttons:

  • Top Left: move left
  • Top Right: move right
  • Bottom Left: jump, the player will jump every few seconds
  • Bottom Right: dash, increases the player speed

--Credits--

Coding by Goldax

Art from 1 bit Kenney assest pack https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
